H3.text: when did the lion king start on broadway. Broadway

A4.text: The Lion King premiered on Broadway at the New Amsterdam Theater on October 15, 1997, in many previews with the official opening on November 13, 1997.

A5.text: The Lion King debuted on July 8, 1997, in Minneapolis, Minnesota at the Orpheum Theatre.
